item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-06
item.description: Andy Jassy officially takes over as Amazon CEO from Jeff Bezos (3 minute read) Jeff Bezos has stepped down as CEO of Amazon and is now the Executive Chair.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-24
item.description: Microsoft in talks with Discord over $10 billion-plus acquisition (1 minute read) Microsoft is in discussions to acquire Discord for more than $10 billion.

item.title: How to deploy an automated trading bot using the Facebook Prophet Machine Learning model to AWS Lambda (serverless)
item.description: I divided this post into the “Why did I do it” and the “Technical How To”.
